name: ekfc_belhopat_chat
description: This app is used for social purpose which includes chat, calls, blogging feeds, status, scheduling meetings etc.

scripts.node:clean: rm -rf node_modules && rm -rf yarn.lock && rm -rf package-lock.json && yarn
scripts.server:dev: yarn update:git && yarn node:clean && yarn dev
scripts.server:qa: yarn update:git && yarn node:clean && yarn qa
scripts.server:prod: yarn update:git && yarn node:clean && yarn prod
